description: This table contains Professional Billing information about your statement print and detail bill records.

columns.name: PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the statement print or detail bill record.

columns.name: PREV_PAT_BAL
columns.description: The Professional Billing outstanding self-pay balance for the guarantor from the previous statement.

columns.name: PREV_AMT_DUE
columns.description: The Professional Billing amount due for the guarantor from the previous statement. It only includes outstanding self-pay balances not on a payment plan.

columns.name: NEW_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing new charge amount.

columns.name: NEW_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing new payment amount.

columns.name: NEW_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing new adjustment amount.

columns.name: TOT_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing total charge amount.

columns.name: TOT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing total payment amount.

columns.name: TOT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The Professional Billing total adjustment amount.

columns.name: CURR_PAT_BAL
columns.description: The Professional Billing outstanding self-pay balance for the guarantor.

columns.name: CURR_AMT_DUE
columns.description: The Professional Billing amount due for the guarantor. It only includes outstanding self-pay balances not on a payment plan.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_TOT
columns.description: The Professional Billing payment plan total amount.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_BAL
columns.description: The Professional Billing payment plan balance.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_DUE
columns.description: The Professional Billing payment plan due amount.

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_CYCLE_AGING_DATE
columns.description: The Professional Billing follow-up cycle aging date.

columns.name: IS_INFORMATIONAL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether or not this is informational (meaning the amount due is zero).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: PREV_INS_BAL
columns.description: The previous Professional Billing insurance balance.

columns.name: NEW_INS_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The new Professional Billing insurance charge amount.

columns.name: NEW_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The new Professional Billing insurance payment amount.

columns.name: NEW_INS_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The new Professional Billing insurance adjustment amount.

columns.name: CURR_INS_BAL
columns.description: The current Professional Billing insurance balance.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The new Professional Billing patient charge amount.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The new patient payment amount.

columns.name: NEW_PAT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The new patient adjustment amount.

columns.name: PREV_UNDIST_AMT
columns.description: Stores the total undistributed amount from previous statement.

columns.name: AUTOPAY_CARD_ID
columns.description: The credit card used for the Professional Billing automatic payment plan.

columns.name: AUTOPAY_DATE
columns.description: The next date that the credit card will be charged for the Professional Billing automatic payment plan.

columns.name: AUTOPAY_AMT_DUE
columns.description: Stores the amount that the credit card will be charged for the Professional Billing automatic payment plan.

columns.name: TOT_DEBIT_AMT
columns.description: The total debit amount.

columns.name: TOT_DEBIT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The total debit adjustment amount.

columns.name: TOT_CREDIT_AMT
columns.description: The total credit amount.

columns.name: TOT_CREDIT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The total credit adjustment amount.

columns.name: TOT_MATCH_INS_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The total matched insurance payment amount.

columns.name: TOT_MATCH_PAT_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The total matched patient payment amount.

columns.name: TOT_MATCH_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The total matched adjustment amount.

columns.name: TOT_UNDIST_AMT
columns.description: The total undistributed amount.

columns.name: PAT_UNDIST_AMT
columns.description: The patient undistributed amount.

columns.name: INS_UNDIST_AMT
columns.description: The insurance undistributed amount.

columns.name: TOT_VOIDED_CHG_AMT
columns.description: The total voided charge amount.

columns.name: TOT_VOIDED_DEBIT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The total voided debit adjustment amount.

columns.name: TOT_VOIDED_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The total voided payment amount.

columns.name: TOT_VOIDED_CREDIT_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The total voided credit adjustment amount.

columns.name: CURR_ACCT_BAL
columns.description: The current account balance.

columns.name: NEW_SKIPPED_CHG_TOT
columns.description: Sum of the original amount of charges that are skipped this statement and shown on the previous statement.

columns.name: NEW_UNSKIPPED_CHG_TOT
columns.description: Sum of the original amount of charges that are shown on this statement and skipped on the previous statement.

columns.name: NEW_VOIDED_TX_TOT
columns.description: Sum of the original amount of void debits that are shown on previous statement.

columns.name: NEW_ADJ_TX_TOT
columns.description: Sum of new adjustments matched amount.

columns.name: NEW_PMT_ADJ_TOT
columns.description: Sum of the difference of the payment's outstanding amount between current statement and previous statement.
